ref.mixed-citation: Behrman, J.A., E. Bryan, and A. Goh. 2014. Gender, climate change, and group based approaches to adaptation. In Enhancing women’s assets to manage risk under climate change: Potential for group- based approaches, ed. C. Ringler, A.R., Quisumbing, E. Bryan, R. Meinzen-Dick, 3–8. Climate Change, Collective Action and Women’s Assets. Washington, DC: International Food Policy Research Institute.
